## Background

This project is supported by the [Ocean Modeling Forum](https://oceanmodelingforum.org/) and the [Lenfest Ocean Program](https://www.lenfestocean.org/en). The goal of the project was to provide a toolbox of tools helpful for stakeholders with data-poor marine mammal stocks. 

## Software products

Work products from this project include the `{mmrefpoints}` [R package](https://github.com/mcsiple/mmrefpoints) and [Shiny app](https://msiple.shinyapps.io/mmrefpoints/). The code for `{mmrefpoints}` is open source and published in the [Journal of Open Source Software](https://joss.theoj.org/papers/10.21105/joss.03888).
